title: Distance between domains in the sense of Letho is not a metric
abstract:
In this paper we consider the question whether the quotient of the set of domains conformally equivalent to a halfplane by the group of Möbius transformations with distance in the 
sense of Lehto is a metric space. The answer is shown to be negative in the general case. However, restricted to analytic domains the question has an afirmative answer.
note:
© 1999 Suomalainen Tiedeakatemia. 

We would like to thank our adviser M. Mateljević for motivation and many helpful discussions and suggestions.
